welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Norco, a charming city known for its equestrian culture and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Norco has to offer during your stay here. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers luxury amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ONT Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, where all domestic and international flights are served.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for handling cargo and freight shipments at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network name provided.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained from the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
